channel.title: Works on mobile devices on Climate Tools
channel.description: Recent content in Works on mobile devices on Climate Tools

item.title: Bay Footprint Calculator
item.description: Developed By: CBF, and UVA Summary: The Bay Footprint Calculator is an easy-to-use tool that estimates your contribution to nitrogen pollution in the Chesapeake Bay.

item.title: MARISA Climate Data Portal: Interactive Map for the MARISA Region
item.description: Developed By: NOAA, and MARISA Summary: The Interactive Map for the MARISA region is an interactive web map that enables users to view real time climate data for the MARISA region.
